Reviews.Title: “very clean, but small-rooms!”
Reviews.Author: etoui
Reviews.Content: I was there for 3 nights, it's a very clean hotel with nice breakfast, just 3min from Taxim Square, our first room was big but with an air condition machine just outside our window ( no view, no air, noisy), and the toilet, with glass door & window!! a little bit weird! haha, but they changed us room immediately when we asked it!

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel BUT...small rooms”
Reviews.Author: Miltos3
Reviews.Content: It was the second time i visited istanbul and this time i paid something more to get a better hotel room.And i did.The service was good,breakfast had almost everything,and i mean it,the rooms were very clean,bathroom was good with hot water no mater what time i wanted to take a shower.The location was just FANTASTIC!On foot,you are 2 minutes away from taksim square,the neighbourhood was nice and safe.To sum up,i would surely stay there again,the price was good too. The only negative thing was the room size.Too small...And no view at all.Of course view wasn't something that you demand with this price and i didn't care at all about it.But the room size was very small. Anyway,great choice!Greetings from Greece

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jango79
Reviews.Content: Cheap, very clean Hotel. People at the desk were really really kind. Breakfast is included and you can eat a lot of different things. Taksim square is 3 minutes by walk. Probably the only "bad" thing is small rooms. I have been here twice and the second time the room was a little small, even if it was really BEAUTIFUL!

Reviews.Title: “OK, but better hotels nearby offer greater value for money”
Reviews.Author: AJC32
Reviews.Content: Very conveniently located, but this is not really a 4 star hotel. The rooms are tiny - hopeless if there are two of you, at best just about OK for single occupancy. I like a hard bed but these are rock hard and not conducive to a good night's sleep. Very small bathrooms with no bathtub, and an old, small lift inadequate for the number of guests, so you need to be fit if on the 7th floor. The staff were helpful and friendly, but gave incorrect information about transport to the airport. Overall I was disappointed. On my next trip to Istanbul I shall be going back to the Central Palace - much the same price but in a totally different class altogether!

Reviews.Title: “Cheaper and not other!!”
Reviews.Author: NapoletanoInVacanza
Reviews.Content: I was in this hotel for a work in Istanbul. You can read by comments below: 1) Room: Little, with noise, little bathroom, dirthy. In other words I never used a room like it!!! 2) Interntet connection: fast and free; 3) Very close to Taksim (center of Instanbul movida). 4) Breakfast: very poor. 5) 4 stars of this hotel are only a dream!!!

Reviews.Title: “Could stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: KK08
Reviews.Content: Ok, well this is a small motel which runs quite efficently. The staff can speak English, fluently enough. Front desk was friendly and check in fast, rooms on the other hand are very small, everything is packed into on small tight room, but hey, the air conditioner was quiet and worked well enough... icy cold if u like. There are many pillows on the bed and the beds where not too hard either. The decor was modern and neutral, room smelt clean, no smoking here! There is tv with 2 or 3 English speaking channels and a tiny yet very clean, compact bathroom with enough room for a small shower cubicle, toilet and hand basin only!! So no more than 1 person in there at any one time because its not possible. All staff members are happy to offer you advice on where to go and what to do and there are many panflets at reception to choose from on what to do etc. Breakfast is great with lots on offer, sweets, cereals, eggs, juices, perculated coffee, toast etc. Yet small breakfast room and again quite tight and crowded- still good value, so dont let that stop u from staying at Eterno. Very close to Taksim square, taxis, public transport, shops, small night markets and fastfood outlets, but try the kebab shop next door, inexpensive and super-delish!

Reviews.Title: “Ideal and affordable”
Reviews.Author: RyanAlkhaled
Reviews.Content: The hotel is small and very well cared. It is at one step to Taksim Square and Iztiklal street. The rooms can pass perfectly for a 4 stars hotel(spanish standards) the hotel is three stars, All rooms are carpeted and comfortable. The dinning room is in the -1 floor. Choose it because is centric and in very good conditions.

HotelInfo.Name: Eterno Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Topcu Cad No:19, Istanbul 34437, Turkey
